A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi is the worst Star Wars movie up to date. Every single second of it was horrendous and revolting. The complete disregard for the original\, and even the prequel trilogy is mind blowing. It ruins all the characters\, and has some do what they would never do. It's a middle finger to everything Star Wars\, and SHOULD be ridiculed\, and SHOULD be forgotten.
